divs: Sighting Detailsthis past saturday night around 3am tecnically sunday morning, my partner and i went to bed, within a few minutes about 10 if i had to be exact, i was stariing at the ceiling which i have done many times before, when i began to notice it looked like a snow storm of stars, i just thought my eyes were focusing in the darkness when it stated to intisify, i began to worry about my health, i am only 34 years old so i have no known health problems, but the ceiling almost seemed like i was traveling tru sapce, when i finnaly told my partner laying next to me that the ceiling was looking really strange to me, when he said yes what is that, and i said what you can see that, he said yes, whe then proceeded to lay there ad watch what seemed to be a cosmic show, when suddenly i felt something around my foot or ankle and began to feel little pin pricks on various parts of my body, i began to scream and crawl up the bed cliching partner tellig him i swear i just felt something touch me,we both began to panic and then we sorta of laughed it off and i layed back flat on my back and began look at ceiling but this time there was a much more intense illumination beaming from the ceiling and at the foot of the bed, as i started to look closer to my horror i saw a huge face at the foot of the bed surging tword me or hovering in the mist of this fog or haze or illumination,moving like i never seen something move, panic stuck me like never before and before i could reaaly process what was happing another green like glowing vapor or haze appeared around the side of the bed and to my disbelief i saw about 15 or so smaller sized beings appearing in the haze i began to scream and cry like a child,remind you i am a 34 year old man who does not just break down sobbing in terror,while my partner began to panic he did not see what i saw ,as i wrestled to clutch for my partner and flip my body twords the other direction i was struck with intense pain in my upper back on the right side like something did not want me to get away. my partner leaped out in terror at what i was doing and fliped on the light trying to reassure me that there was nothing in the room. i dont know what this all means but but the faces of the smaller ones were thoose alien faces we have all seen many times over the years, and i was shocked beyond belief, they appeared to be observing the bigger interdimensional one,i cannot get this experience out my head, is there any one that can help me. i am attaching of a drwaing of what i saw

Summary: glowing haze or vapor or fog or something
